title: Vinko Begović
text:
Vinko Begović (born October 2, 1948) is a <a href="Croat">Croat</a>ian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> manager and former player.
He has previously served as head coach of several clubs namely <a href="Foolad%20F.C.">Foolad</a>, <a href="Persepolis%20F.C.">Persepolis</a> and <a href="Pegah%20Gilan%20F.C.">Pegah Gilan</a> of Iran, and <a href="Al%20Wasl%20FC">Al-Wasl</a> of the <a href="UAE">UAE</a>. He was also manager of the <a href="Iran%20national%20under-23%20football%20team">Iran national under-23 football team</a> for a short period in 2007. From December 2012 to March 2013, he was also assistant coach at Persepolis and also head coach of <a href="Persepolis%20F.C.%20Reserves">Persepolis B</a> for three months.
